spec_data.Name: php-pear-HTTP-Request2
spec_data.Description:
PHP5 rewrite of HTTP_Request package. Provides cleaner API and pluggable
Adapters. Currently available are:
  * Socket adapter, based on old HTTP_Request code,
  * Curl adapter, wraps around PHP's cURL extension,
  * Mock adapter, to use for testing packages dependent on HTTP_Request2.
Supports POST requests with data and file uploads, basic and digest
authentication, cookies, proxies, gzip and deflate encodings, monitoring
the request progress with Observers...
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:34:48 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provides an easy way to perform HTTP requests
